overview: A funeral feast, a marriage, a final dance, and a first one. With an unmistakable cast and symbolic décor, the Starz-Borowiec duo once again creates a congenial video translation of the music of the Viennese song writer Voodoo Jürgens, who muses about love, the past, and Ludwig Hirsch’s “big black bird” in the melancholic tango “Federkleid.”
title: Voodoo Jürgens – Federkleid
